actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the Center Hill Lake, Tenn., flood control project.

summary.text: Modifies the Center Hill Lake, Tennessee, flood control project to provide that the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, shall improve two and one- half miles of Casey Cove Road leading into the Holmes Creek Recreation Area. Estimates the cost of such project at $500,000. Directs that such cost shall be borne by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to modify the Center Hill Lake, Tenn., flood control project.
